GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns the type of the ApiThemeFontScheme class.

SetSchemeName.name: SetSchemeName
SetSchemeName.description: Sets a name to the current theme font scheme.

SetFonts.name: SetFonts
SetFonts.description: Sets the fonts to the current theme font scheme.

params.name: mjLatin
params.description: The major theme font applied to the latin text.

params.name: mjEa
params.description: The major theme font applied to the east asian text.

params.name: mjCs
params.description: The major theme font applied to the complex script text.

params.name: mnLatin
params.description: The minor theme font applied to the latin text.

params.name: mnEa
params.description: The minor theme font applied to the east asian text.

params.name: mnCs
params.description: The minor theme font applied to the complex script text.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of the current theme font scheme.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiThemeFontScheme object into the JSON object.

comment:
/**
     * Class representing a theme font scheme.
     * @constructor
     */
